Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: No visitors! I'm very - Oh! Aren't you delicious. All right, little one, you like to stick your neck out?

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Marvelous, kitten! I'm throwing a party tonight at Pandora's Box. You'll be on the list.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Marvelous, kitten! I'm throwing a party tonight at Pandora's Box. You'll be on the list. Well... you'll be on the menu.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: The nightclub around the corner. The music is loud, the drinks are strong...

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: The nightclub around the corner. The music is loud, the drinks are strong... and the little lambs that flock there are easily seduced.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Cull that flock, kitten. Come back when you've drunk your fill.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Mmm. Good feastling. Now, off with you! Come back when you've drunk your fill.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Child. Whether safely under my wing or alone on the street, make no mistake...

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Child. Whether safely under my wing or alone on the street, make no mistake... You are ALWAYS food.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Now, kitten:

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Now, kitten: You WILL visit the Pandora's Box nightclub, you WILL feed on the silly little lambs there, and you WON'T argue with me!

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Off with you, kitten. Come speak to me after you've sampled the cuisine at Pandora's Box.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Come in, kitten!

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Come in, kitten! Yes: you are a rare beauty indeed. And resilient yet, despite the porcelain pallor in your depletion.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Yes, I WILL be keeping you.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Go. FEED. Restore that rosy bloom, so you may once again be plucked.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Ha! It is well you know your place, child, but let us not be so uncouth as to state it outright.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Better. Subtlety is a balm in times of rest...

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Better. Subtlety is a balm in times of rest... a knife in times of cruelty...

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Better. Subtlety is a balm in times of rest... a knife in times of cruelty... And there are no other times. Now go.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: The dark hides far worse than us, newborn. Presume too much about your own needs, and you will surely find yourself slaking theirs.

Say.speaker: Lilith
Say.text: Now go. And do not bother me until you have shared blood with another of our kind.
